item.description:
Join us for the inaugural gathering of Ron Paul's unofficial New Hampshire volunteer network.

It's time to get organized--with yard signs, rallies, donation drives, whatever we can think up and do to put Ron Paul's presidential campaign in the spotlight, where it belongs. So come with ideas--and friends.

The meeting will be held at 136 N. Main Street, Suite #8 in Concord. Next door to the state Republican Party headquarters, across from the State House; just head upstairs, and down the hall past Cornerstone Policy Research.
item.name: Strategy Session #1
